flawed_nl_solution:
He has 30 boxwoods to trim and will charge $5 each so he will charge 30*5 = $<<30*5=150>>150
He will shape 4 boxwoods into spheres for $15 each so he will charge 4*15 = $$<<4*15=60>>60
All total he will charge 150+60 = $<<150+60=206>>206
#### 206

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 210, not 206. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
